11 GripperActuator::GripperActuator(const std::string &name, const BT::NodeConfiguration &config):BT::SyncActionNode(name, config){
12  object_attached_ = false;
13  object_attached_before_ = false;
14  ROS_LOG_INIT(this->name().c_str());
15 }
16 
22 BT::NodeStatus GripperActuator::tick(){
23  ros::NodeHandle nh;
24  grasp_publisher_ = nh.advertise<std_msgs::Float64>(GRIPPER_TOPIC, 100, true);
25  grasp_subscriber_ = nh.subscribe(DEFAULT_CONTACT_TOPIC, 1, &GripperActuator::ResultCallback, this);
26  std_msgs::Float64 payload;
27  float gripper_val = getInput<float>("gripper_param").value();
28  ROS_INFO("Gripping -> value: %.3f", gripper_val);
29  payload.data = gripper_val;
30  grasp_publisher_.publish(payload);
31  ros::Duration(0.2).sleep();
32  BT::NodeStatus result = object_attached_^object_attached_before_?BT::NodeStatus::SUCCESS : BT::NodeStatus::FAILURE;
33  object_attached_before_ = object_attached_;
34  return BT::NodeStatus::SUCCESS;
35 };
36 
42 BT::PortsList GripperActuator::providedPorts(){
43  return {BT::InputPort<float>("gripper_param")} ;
44 }
45 
46 #pragma endregion
47 
48 #pragma region private
49 
55 void GripperActuator::ResultCallback(const std_msgs::Float64 &message){
56  object_attached_before_ = object_attached_;
57  object_attached_ = !object_attached_;
58 }
59
